original_text: But you have dishonored the poor man. Are not the rich the ones who oppress you, and the ones who drag you into court?
korean_text: 너희는 도리어 가난한 자를 업신여겼도다 부자는 너희를 억압하며 법정으로 끌고 가지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: But you have dishonored the poor man.
Are not the rich the ones who oppress you
and the ones who drag you into court?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신을 법정으로 끌고 가는 자들이 아닙니까?
